Class BayesianClustering<T extends AdditiveClusterable<T>>

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CentroidClusteringMethod<T>, ClusteringMethod<T>, ClusterList<T>, OnlineClusteringMethod<T>, PrototypeBasedCentroidClusteringMethod<T>, SupervisedClusteringMethod<T>

    public class BayesianClustering<T extends AdditiveClusterable<T>>
extends NearestNeighborClustering<T>
    Performs cluster classification with a naive bayesian classifier
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    David Tulga, David Soergel
